Package gears.sidescroller.world.machines

Class PlacedGearMachine

java.lang.Object
gears.sidescroller.world.core.WorldObject
gears.sidescroller.world.machines.AbstractMachine
gears.sidescroller.world.machines.GearMachine
gears.sidescroller.world.machines.PlacedGearMachine
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonSerializable, Collidable, Interactable, PowerProvidingMachine
public class PlacedGearMachine extends GearMachine implements Interactable
A PlacedGearMachine is simply a GearMachine a Player has placed via a GearItem. The Player can pick this back up by interacting with it.
